items.name: Salem Witch Trials Fine Art Collection
items.description: Salem Witch Stories - A Fine Arts Photography Project I did on the victims of The Salem Witch Trials. Fine Art Techniques Used, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Lightroom, and portraits shot with Nikon DSLR Cameras. 2020-2022.
